column3: Optimizing computational resource management for the scientific gateways ecosystems based on the service-oriented paradigm.
column4: Edvard Martins de Oliveira; Júlio Cezar Estrella; Alexandre Cláudio Botazzo Delbem; Mario Henrique de Souza Pardo; Fausto Guzzo da Costa; Alexandre Defelicibus; Stephan Reiff-Marganiec
